answers.answer: Sugar count would have to do with diabetes.  You can develop gestational diabetes sometimes.  Low blood sugar is known as hypoglycemia.

well low sugar counts can happen to anyone,,,,depending on ur body condition,,, it can be corrected by increasing the levels by means of diet r thro iv fluids........... "they have told her she might not be as far gone as she thinks or she is aving an optopic pregnancy".......... Is the spelling optic correct its usually ectopic pregnancy which means that the implantation of the foetus is not exactly inside the uterus but elsewhere where ther could be problem with continuing the pregnancy,,,in some cases even ectopic pregnancy mothers hav given birth to child..... plzz do consult another doc get an ultrasound done again to confirm the diagnosis

title: what does low sugar count mean when ur 6wks pregnaunt
